about_the_game: This is a <u>2D simple puzzle game</u> where the player follows the mouse and you cannot touch any obstacles or you will have to restart the level. You will have obstacles in your way to make the levels more difficult like spinners, chasing blocks, disappearing blocks and more. You will collect coins along the way and try to be as precise as possible to get through small passage ways and openings. Being simple to learn, this game is for everyone. Challenge yourself to speed through each level as fast as possible. Try your best to get through them all! More levels will be added with new obstacles for you to have to create new strategies to get around. This game can be very triggering but when you complete a level it feels good!
detailed_description: This is a <u>2D simple puzzle game</u> where the player follows the mouse and you cannot touch any obstacles or you will have to restart the level. You will have obstacles in your way to make the levels more difficult like spinners, chasing blocks, disappearing blocks and more. You will collect coins along the way and try to be as precise as possible to get through small passage ways and openings. Being simple to learn, this game is for everyone. Challenge yourself to speed through each level as fast as possible. Try your best to get through them all! More levels will be added with new obstacles for you to have to create new strategies to get around. This game can be very triggering but when you complete a level it feels good!
name: Precision

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a simple 2d follow the mouse game where you have to get to the end to win! This game can be annoying and hard to get through levels but can be very fun! If you touch anything red you will die.
